title: Creating, monitoring, and testing cron jobs on AWS
description: In this article we walk you through how to create a cron job on AWS using AWS Lambda and Serverless Framework and how to get the right alerts and security measures in place.

title: Join us for the Global Day of Coderetreat on November 16th
description: For the 10th anniversary of the Global Day of Coderetreat, InVision is once again hosting a remote-friendly event. In the spirit of GDCR, the day will be dedicated to providing an encouraging space for practicing the fundamentals of software craftsmanship such as modular design, pair programming, and test-driven development. Itâ€™s free to attend and open to all skill levels. Join us starting at 10AM EST (UTC -5) on Saturday November 16th.
